original_text: Thus saith the Lord, Go and get a potter's earthen bottle, and take of the ancients of the people, and of the ancients of the priests;
korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 가서 토기장이의 옹기를 사고 백성의 어른들과 제사장의 어른 몇 사람과

sentences.original_text: Go and get a potter's earthen bottle
and take of the ancients of the people
and of the ancients of the priests
